text: Oleksandr Oleksandrovych Marchenko (; 14 January 1965 â€“ 7 March 2022) was a Ukrainian politician. He was a member of Svoboda. He was in the Verkhovna Rada from 2014 to 2019. Marchenko died in battle in Pushcha-Vodytsia while fighting in the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine on 7 March, at the age of 57. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada Category:Military people killed in action Category:Ukrainian military people
title: Oleksandr Marchenko (politician)
